issue.title: [CF 1416] Earthen Spike bug
issue.body:
When i use earthen spike, my tellmewhen timer for flametounge disappears no matter how much time it has left on the buff. tried making new timers, still did the same


> Posted by CurseForge user Weezywoll | Imported from CurseForge issue #1416 | Raw

comments.body:
Post the export strings of the icons you're having trouble with
